pageContext.title: Rebel
pageContext.description: Your power, presentation, reputation, or history cause common folk to fear or reject you.

front.name: Rebel
front.desc: Your power, presentation, reputation, or history cause common folk to fear or reject you.
prompts: Use others' fears to your advantage
Surpass a limit or break a rule imposed by others
Make common cause with other rebels

back.name: Rebel
back.desc: To be the worst of what they say you are. How easy to do it accidentally. How tempting to choose it.
prompts: Make everything worse for yourself or an ally
Fall prey to temptation or darkness
back.rule: Flip when a prompt is narrated by anyone.
